availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander G. Nave (Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Nave and Serphinia W. Totten Nave. Farmer in Garrard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 255A.
"Alexander George Nave (1838-1931)," Find A Grave, Memorial #195540389, accessed November 8, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/195540389.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #27219.
